getNavVerifier().details: Provides the address of the nav verifier

getVaultEventful().details: Provides the address of the vault logs contract

isAuthority(address).details: Provides whether an address is an authority

isWhitelistedDrago(address).details: Provides whether a drago is whitelisted

isWhitelistedRegistry(address).details: Provides whether a registry is whitelisted

isWhitelistedUser(address).details: Provides whether a user is whitelisted

isWhitelistedVault(address).details: Provides whether a vault is whitelisted

setAuthority(address,bool).details: Allows the owner to whitelist an authority

setDragoEventful(address).details: Allows the owner to set the drago eventful

setExchangesAuthority(address).details: Allows the owner to set the exchanges authority

setNavVerifier(address).details: Allows the owner to set the nav verifier

setVaultEventful(address).details: Allows the owner to set the vault eventful

params._vaultEventful: Address of the vault logs contract

setWhitelister(address,bool).details: Allows the owner to whitelist a whitelister

whitelistDrago(address,bool).details: Allows an admin to whitelist a drago

whitelistFactory(address,bool).details: Allows an admin to whitelist a factory

whitelistRegistry(address,bool).details: Allows an admin to whitelist a registry

whitelistUser(address,bool).details: Allows a whitelister to whitelist a user

whitelistVault(address,bool).details: Allows an admin to whitelist a vault
